review.title: Application of k Means Clustering algorithm for prediction of Students Academic Performance
review.abstract: The ability to monitor the progress of students academic performance is a critical issue to the academic community of higher learning. A system for analyzing students results based on cluster analysis and uses standard statistical algorithms to arrange their scores data according to the level of their performance is described. In this paper, we also implemented k mean clustering algorithm for analyzing students result data. The model was combined with the deterministic model to analyze the students results of a private Institution in Nigeria which is a good benchmark to monitor the progression of academic performance of students in higher Institution for the purpose of making an effective decision by the academic planners.

sections.heading: IV. DISCUSSION AND CONCLUSION
sections.text: In this paper, we provided a simple and qualitative methodology to compare the predictive power of the cluster algorithm and Euclidean distance as a measure of similarity distance. We demonstrated our technique using the Kmeans cluster algorithm [6] and combined it with the deterministic model in [7] on a dataset of private school outcomes with nine courses offered for each semester for a total of 79 students, and created the numerical interpretation of the results for performance evaluation. This model improved some of the limitations of existing methods, such as the model developed by [7] and [8]. These models applied a blurred model to predict the academic performance of students on only two datasets (English and mathematics) of secondary school outcomes. Also, the research of [9] provides only data mining frameworks for the academic performance of students. The research of [10] used rough set theory as a classification kit to analyze the student data used in the Rosendetta to evaluate the student data.

metadata.abstractText: The ability to monitor the progress of students’ academic performance is a critical issue to the academic community of higher learning. A system for analyzing students’ results based on cluster analysis and uses standard statistical algorithms to arrange their scores data according to the level of their performance is described. In this paper, we also implemented k-mean clustering algorithm for analyzing students’ result data. The model was combined with the deterministic model to analyze the students’ results of a private Institution in %igeria which is a good benchmark to monitor the progression of academic performance of students in higher Institution for the purpose of making an effective decision by the academic planners. Keywordsk – mean, clustering, academic performance, algorithm.
